body.description: Amazon Basics Hydrating Facial Cleanser is developed with a blend of glycerin, ceramides, sodium hyaluronate, and Vitamin E to help keep skin moisturized. Perfect for normal to dry skin, this cleanser is fragrance free and non-comedogenic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great face wash
reviews.reviewText: This face was is pretty impressive coming from Amazon I tried their foaming face wash and it didn't really impress me but this one is so much better. The cleanser removes oil from your skin very well and leaves your face clean but it doesn't dry your skin out at all and even leaves it feeling moist and hydrated after using this I don't even feel the need to use a toner. Overall it's a great face wash it's very impressive and is perfect for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Feels like lotion
reviews.reviewText: It feels like I'm rubbing lotion on my face but I guess I was looking for a mild cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cleanser for dry or post procedure skin!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic valued dupe cleanser as mentioned in the description, it’s spot on. This cleanser is not a foaming or lathering style it’s a lotion style formulation that works best for dry or post procedure skin. Amazing to use after my facial peels and microdermabrasion to calm and clean my face without any irritation. Its eight dollar price point is a fantastic value considering its dupe is nearly twice that. Amazon basics for the win again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic unscented clenser - no complaints
reviews.reviewText: Simple facial clenser which isn't scented (although it does have that "unscented smell" if you know what I mean), no irritation after using it daily and the despenser works well. It is slightly greasy after application, but nothing really worth complaining about as it's typical of most cleansers like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans and is not drying.
reviews.reviewText: Although this did not lather up much it did remove all of my makeup easily and after the final rinse it left my face clean and moisturized with no dry feeling. This is basic and it is all I need even in these drying winter months and my older skin. There is no scent which I am very happy about and the plain white bottle sits easily on my small vanity. No soap bars to fuss with either. I really do not think I can do any better with any other brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Soap is OK; pump broke before first use
reviews.reviewText: I really struggled to unscrew the pump for first use, which is usually an easy thing to do. After multiple attempts to gently spin it the usual way, tried the other way, then tried several more times, and ended up popping the whole mechanism out with the spring flying who knows where. Then came the attempt to reassemble after locating said spring, but it was fruitless. I've used this a couple times pouring from the bottle mouth and it goes on like a slippery lotion and didn't dry out my face too much, though I still needed moisturizer after. Might have to find a different bottle to dispense it from if I'm going to use it. I do prefer a little lather, honestly, to feel my face is clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, Fair Job Of Cleansing
reviews.reviewText: I will admit I have more oily skin, and this is more for normal to dry skin types so I won’t be too harsh on this. I have been comparing this to the Amazon Basics foaming cleanser, which more for my skin type. As described, this is about as close to fragrance free as you are going to get. There is only a very subtle soapy scent to it. The consistency of the cleanser is a watery lotion. It does not produce many suds on my face while scrubbing. This does a so so job of cleaning my skin, but does a good job of moisturizing. Overall the price is reasonable and it does a good job of moisturizing the skin. I would suggest it for someone that has oily skin as it doesn’t leave you with that clean feeling that foaming cleansers often do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good replacement for name brand
reviews.reviewText: I'm all about trying less expensive products that replicate name brand, higher priced products. And this one I think does a good job of replicating the same results as the name brand it mentions on the label. It cleans my face well and leaves my dry skin feeling soft and moisturized.
